articles.author: Bryan Mena
articles.title: Consumer sentiment surges in first improvement since December - CNN
articles.description: Americans have gained some hope that the worst of President Donald Trump’s volatile trade war might be in the rearview mirror.
articles.content:
Americans have gained some hope that the worst of President Donald Trumps volatile trade war might be in the rearview mirror.
Consumer sentiment surged 16% this month to a preliminary reading of 60.… [+2778 chars]
